text:
For Tomcat version 5.5.16 AND 5.5.17 ONLY the Windows service version, gives 404
errors.  When the application version (tomcat5.exe) is run -NOT as a service-
There is no problem.  With no changes to any config.

Windows version: Server 2003 Enterprise Edition [version 5.2 build
3790.srv03_rtm.030324-2048]
JVM version: JDK 1.5.06
creator: alan.lewis@uk.fujitsu.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 39787 ***
creator: markt@apache.org
alan.lewis@uk.fujitsu.com
text:
This defect report is flagged as RESOLVED.  Can someone please let me know what
the resolution is as I am stuck with the symptoms of this fault.


Regards
Alan Lewis

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
Please read the comments on the duplicate bug report you filed for this issue.
It looks like a configuration issue rather than a bug and Bugzilla is not the
right forum to resolve configuration issues.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 39787 ***
